name: Undead Riot
description:
Crawling out of caves, destroying crops, attacking villages, once peaceful but now violent, zombies have risen in countless waves. Create a gang of gunslingers, work together or solo, defend the town, and become a legend.

Undead Riot is a twin-stick split-screen shooter. Players must last as long as possible in this endless wave-based shooter. Work together or against, achieve the top score or focus on other scores. This fun arcadey game allows players to sit back and play together in a fast-paced shoot-em-up game.

This game uses a controller only.
